title: Daniel Wu
summary: Daniel Wu Neh-Tsu (Chinese: 吳彥祖; pinyin: Wú Yànzǔ, born September 30, 1974) is a Hong Kong American actor, director and producer based in Hong Kong. He is known as a "flexible and distinctive" leading actor in the Chinese language film industry.[2][3] Since his film debut in 1998, he has been featured in over 60 films.[4] He also starred in the AMC martial arts drama series Into the Badlands.
